snippet.title: Digimon Heroes! Trailer HD
snippet.description:
Digimon Heroes! is a FREE match-3 Card Battle adventure featuring an all-star cast of more than 1000 of your favorite DIGIMON characters in the palm of your hand.

Save the Digital World from crisis!

Due to sudden and unceasing wars, the Digital World is quickly becoming devastated. Concerned with the situation, Ophanimon orders her aide Angewomon to find the chosen warrior, "The Digimon Hero" who will return peace to the land.

Use cards to win battles!
Using the special Command Cards given to you by the Angewomon, your Digimon will form successive attacks called "Chains" which devstate the enemy!

Build the strongest Digimon army!
You can enhance the Digimon who have joined your party by fusing them, then evolve them into even stronger forms, and finally break through their limits to create the strongest Digimon in the digital world.

Aim to build the strongest Digimon army with over 1000 different Digimon to choose from!

Epic Battles and Special Dungeons!
Battle through the story and push your Digimon team to its limits with limited time special events and challenges!

A flood of original illustrations!
Featuring hundreds of original illustrations!

Get the game for FREE here:
Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/de...
App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/nz/app/digim...

Join the community here:
www.facebook.com/DigimonHeroesGame

Follow Bandai Namco Games:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BandaiNamcoE...
Website: http://www.bandainamcoent.ro/
